116.content: What shall we do when we find a shortage in the shipment ?
You should do one of the two things - either to lodge a claim with the shipowner or with the insurance company .
Shall we leave it to the brokers ?
Yes, they do. It’s part of their service, but they charge a fee for handling the claim.
Is it the same in America ?
It’s generally the same, but the fees can vary depending on the broker and the complexity of the claim. It’s always best to get a quote beforehand.
It's part of their service , isn't it ?
Exactly. They’re compensated for their time, expertise, and the administrative work involved in pursuing the claim. Think of it like a retainer for that specific service.
Is it enough to claim with an on board bill of lading ?
Yes, an on-board bill of lading is absolutely essential. It’s the primary document for proving the discrepancy and outlining the shortage.
I see . By the way , how do we prove the ownership of our goods ?
That’s a crucial question. You’ll need a combination of documents to prove ownership.
You’re welcome. Let's talk about those documents specifically. Do you want me to list them out, or would you like to start with a particular type, like invoices or packing lists?

516.content: After I am accepted for unemployment benefits , what will happen next ?
You will receive a Notice of Unemployment Insurance Award letter .
The Award Letter will tell you how much you will receive weekly .
Are there any other forms that I need to fill out ?
Yes, you’ll need to complete a Work Search Report every two weeks while you’re receiving benefits. You’ll also need to respond to any requests for information from the unemployment office.
What information will I need to provide on that form ?

The Work Search Report typically asks for the date, time, and a description of the job you looked for. It should also include the name and contact information of the employer or person you spoke with.
Are there any other questions on the form ?
Some Work Search Reports may also ask if you were rejected for a job, and if so, why. It’s important to be honest and accurate on this form.

That’s helpful. Okay, let’s think. Do you remember anything else about it? Any specific cards, a photo, anything at all that might help us identify it?
I don't think it's at home . I think I had it when I left the house.But what should I do ?
Okay, let’s not panic. Let’s start with the basics. Do you have a phone number we can call to report it lost?
Should I call the police ?
That's a valid consideration, especially if you suspect it might be stolen. However, let’s explore other options first.
Hmm . I'll go home and check . Maybe you're right . Maybe it's at home .
That’s a good idea. I’m really sorry this happened. If you do find it, please let us know.
Thanks for your help .

Yes , it was the kind of perfect plastic wrap that comes with new products.Look , it even had a bar-code price sticker on it ! It looked brand new .
Okay, okay. Let’s just take a deep breath. You bought a sealed box, with a sticker, for twenty dollars. What exactly did you do with it?
He said he had to get rid of them . They were stolen .
Stolen? So he was trying to sell you stolen goods? That’s… a whole different level of messed up. Okay, first, don’t touch it.

71.content: Just as the saying goes , every potter praises his own pot . You should pay special attention to selling yourself properly in the interview .
It is especially important for the graduates who step into the job market for the first time .
You'd better prepare what you are going to say in advance , in order to have a good performance in the interview .
The contents should be mainly descriptions of your background . And the length depends on the particular situation .
Only when you are aware of what the interviewer will be interested in , can you make a targeted preparation .
Exactly! Think about what they're looking for – skills, experience, personality traits – and tailor your responses to highlight those areas.
Selling yourself should go straight to the point , and the statement should be clear and brief .
Absolutely. Avoid rambling. Focus on 2-3 key strengths or experiences that directly relate to the job description. A concise, impactful statement is much more memorable.
You should particularly state your strong points which are closely related to the position you are applying for .
Precisely. Don’t just list skills; give  of how you’ve used them successfully. Quantify your achievements whenever possible – numbers always make a stronger impression.
Time permitted , you could add certain examples to your description .
That’s a fantastic idea! A brief anecdote or example demonstrating a skill in action can really bring your qualifications to life.

Absolutely. You should limit processed foods, sugary drinks, and excessive amounts of saturated and trans fats. Those can really contribute to health problems down the road.

Regular exercise is crucial! Aim for at least 30 minutes of moderate-intensity activity most days of the week. That could be brisk walking, swimming, or cycling.

That's a good question. In moderation, a glass of wine occasionally is generally considered acceptable for most adults.

858.content: I need to use the ATM .
I ’ Ve never used one before .
Okay, no problem. Let’s walk through it. First, find the ATM. It’s usually located inside a bank branch or in a shopping mall.
What do I have to do ?
Once you find an ATM, insert your debit card into the card reader. It will pop out automatically. Then, enter your PIN – that’s your Personal Identification Number – carefully.
After you enter your PIN, you’ll be presented with a menu of options. You’ll typically see choices like “Withdrawal,” “Balance Inquiry,” and “Transfer.
What do I have to do next ?
Choose “Withdrawal.” Then, you’ll be prompted to select the account you want to withdraw from – usually your checking account. Next, enter the amount you want to withdraw.

96.content: How does the political system work in your country ?
We have hundreds of constituencies and the voters in each one elect a member of parliament . Most people call them mp ’ s .
Each mp belongs to a political party , right ?

Almost all of them do . A few are independent . That means that they do not belong to a party . If one party more than half of the mp ’ s . they form a government . That means that they choose a prime Finist
The cabinet is a group of ministers who help the prime minister run the country.
Can any mp make a law ?
Not really. The main job of the MPs is to debate and vote on laws proposed by the government. They don’t actually  the laws themselves.
I suppose a proposed a law needs the support of the big political parties .
Exactly! A bill – that’s what we call a proposed law – needs to be supported by a majority of MPs to pass through Parliament.
How do people choose which party or candidate to vote for ?
That’s a really important question! People usually choose based on the party’s policies and what they believe is best for the country.
